title: RLBot agent
description: A bot or script for RLBot

settings.description: The in-game applicable settings for the bot

agent_id.description: The static, unique id that is associated with this bot. Preferred format is 'author/bot-name'.

loadout_file.description: The path to the loadout file for the bot. Ignored for scripts.

root_dir.description: A path to the root directory of the bot, e.g. './bin/'. The run_command will be run from the root directory.

run_command.description: Command RLBot can use to start the bot

run_command_linux.description: Specialized command RLBot can use to start the bot on Linux

hivemind.description: Whether all bot team mates with this agent id is controlled by the same process. Ignored for scripts.

details.description: Optional details that will appear in RLBot's GUI

fun_fact.description: A fun fact about the bot/script

source_link.description: A link to the source code of the bot/script

language.description: The language the bot/script is written in

tags.description: A list of tags that describe the bot/script
